templates.name: Guardian
templates.description: A nimble warrior specializing in lightsaber combat, using finesse and defensive techniques to overwhelm opponents.
templates.quote: Through the Force, I am the shield that guards the innocent.
templates.notes: Attack +7, Reflex Defense 19, HP 32. Block talent allows negating melee attacks with Use the Force check.

templates.name: Consular
templates.description: A Force-focused diplomat who relies on manipulation of the Force and wisdom rather than lightsaber combat.
templates.quote: The Force flows through all things. Let it guide your path to peace.
templates.notes: Use the Force +9, Will Defense 18, 4 Force Powers. Force Sight ability ignores concealment. Force Focus allows regaining spent Force Power.

templates.name: Defender
templates.description: A durable frontline protector who can deflect attacks and shield allies from harm.
templates.quote: I can't afford to lose this fight! There are people depending on me.
templates.notes: HP 35, Fort Defense 19, Use the Force +9 for Deflect checks. Zabrak CON bonus makes this an excellent tank. Scarred background grants Favorable Circumstances when Intimidating.

templates.name: Sentinel
templates.description: An investigative shadow who hunts down dark side corruption with precision and stealth.
templates.quote: Darkness cannot hide from those who seek the light.
templates.notes: Use the Force +9, Will Defense 18. Force Sight ignores concealment. Dark Side Sense allows rerolls to detect dark siders. Nar Shaddaa Origin adds Stealth as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Diplomat
templates.description: The ultimate social character, capable of talking their way through any situation with charm and persuasion.
templates.quote: Words can open doors that even the strongest blade cannot.
templates.notes: Persuasion +18 with Zeltron bonuses, Will Defense 16. Inspire Confidence grants +1 morale bonus to all allies.

templates.name: Leader
templates.description: A tactical commander who coordinates allies and inspires greatness on the battlefield.
templates.quote: Victory belongs to those who fight together as one!
templates.notes: HP 20, Reflex 13, Will 17. Born Leader grants swift action +1 insight bonus to allies' attacks.

templates.name: Aristocrat
templates.description: A wealthy manipulator with extensive resources, connections, and information networks.
templates.quote: Information is the galaxy's most valuable currency, and I am very wealthy.
templates.notes: 10 trained skills, 6,500 starting credits with Wealth talent. Bothan bonuses to Gather Information. Fondor Origin adds Mechanics as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Duelist
templates.description: A social character with surprising melee combat effectiveness using grace and finesse.
templates.quote: Elegance in both word and bladeâ€”a true noble's art.
templates.notes: Melee attack +5 using CHA, 2d6 damage, HP 19. Noble Fencing Style allows using CHA for light melee attacks. Scarred background grants Favorable Circumstances when Intimidating.

templates.name: Pistoleer
templates.description: A precision shooter who deals devastating damage with sneak attacks from the shadows.
templates.quote: They never see it coming. That's the whole point.
templates.notes: Attack +4, 3d8+3 damage (4d8+3 vs flat-footed), Reflex Defense 17. Precise Shot removes shooting into melee penalty.

templates.name: Skill Monkey
templates.description: A versatile specialist covering social, technical, and infiltration roles with expertise.
templates.quote: Every problem has a solution. You just need the right skills.
templates.notes: Use Computer +10, 8 trained skills. Knack allows rerolling one skill check per day.

templates.name: Knuckledragger
templates.description: An aggressive street fighter who pushes enemies down the condition track with dirty tactics.
templates.quote: No such thing as a fair fight when survival's on the line.
templates.notes: Attack +5 with DEX 18. Dastardly Strike moves targets -1 condition track when denied DEX bonus. Enslaved background grants +2 competence to Grapple checks.

templates.name: Outlaw
templates.description: A charming rogue who uses luck and Force Points strategically to turn the odds in their favor.
templates.quote: Luck? I make my own luck, friend.
templates.notes: Persuasion +9 (+14 with Fool's Luck). Fool's Luck spends Force Point for +1 attack OR +5 skills OR +1 defenses.

templates.name: Brigand
templates.description: A roguish brigand who combines exceptional piloting skills with tactical combat prowess, striking from unexpected angles with deadly precision.
templates.quote: The galaxy's wealth flows to those bold enough to take it.
templates.notes: Attack +6 with exceptional Dexterity (18), Reflex Defense 18. Flawless Pilot allows rerolling Pilot checks and taking the better result. Opportunistic Strike enables bonus attacks against enemies that provoke for allies. Starting equipment emphasizes point-blank precision strikes with the Needler as backup poison option.

templates.name: Sniper
templates.description: A long-range precision shooter who operates from concealment with deadly accuracy.
templates.quote: One shot, one kill. That's all it takes.
templates.notes: Professional pilot with exceptional reflexes and marksmanship. Flawless Pilot allows rerolling Pilot checks and taking the better result. Surveillance talent provides enhanced reconnaissance capabilities. Duro Origin adds Use Computer as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Engineer
templates.description: A skilled technician who specializes in maintenance, repair, and engineering solutions in the field.
templates.quote: Every problem has a technical solution.
templates.notes: Master technician with exceptional perception and intelligence. Mon Calamari Shipwright provides expertise in starship systems. Skill Focus (Perception) reflects Mon Calamari natural observational abilities. Fondor Origin adds Use Computer as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Pistoleer
templates.description: A skilled rider specializing in hit-and-run tactics from a speeder bike, utilizing dual-weapon mastery.
templates.quote: Speed and precision - that's all you need.
templates.notes: Elite rider with exceptional dexterity and extra arms. Codru-Ji Dual Weapon Mastery I allows dual-wielding with extra arms advantage. Mechanized Rider talent allows advanced speeder bike maneuvers. Tatooine Origin adds Ride as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Skirmisher
templates.description: A mobile combatant specializing in hit-and-run tactics and battlefield positioning.
templates.quote: Speed and precision win battles. Stand still and you're already dead.
templates.notes: 8 squares movement, Running Attack allows moving and shooting. Excellent battlefield mobility.

templates.name: Survivalist
templates.description: A wilderness expert who excels at tracking and surviving the harshest conditions.
templates.quote: The wilderness doesn't forgive mistakes. Neither do I.
templates.notes: Survival +12, HP 42, Fort Defense 15. Evasion grants half damage on area attacks (no damage on miss).

templates.name: Infiltrator
templates.description: A stealthy infiltrator specializing in reconnaissance and espionage operations.
templates.quote: The best battles are the ones your enemy never knew you fought.
templates.notes: Stealth +18 at level 1. Improved Stealth reduces movement penalty from -10 to -5. Bothawui Origin adds Deception as class skill for +3 bonus.

templates.name: Rifleman
templates.description: A straightforward soldier carrying a slugthrower rifle and a big pistol. Perfect for new players learning weapon versatility and the practical Bandolier.
templates.quote: I've got firepower. Let's see what you've got.
templates.notes: Houk physiology provides natural durability. Commanding Presence: Once per encounter (Swift Action), all opponents within 6 squares take -2 penalty to Will Defense (Mind-Affecting Fear effect). Persuasion is a Class Skill for this character. Introduces the Bandolier (retrieve ammo/grenades with move action). When able, swap Slugthrower Rifle for a Heavy Weapon. Starting equipment includes Force Unleashed and Commanding Presence talents.

templates.name: Gunner
templates.description: A heavy weapons specialist focusing on area suppression and overwhelming firepower.
templates.quote: More firepower solves most problems.
templates.notes: 3d10 damage with autofire capability. Excels at suppressing multiple enemies.

templates.name: Brawler
templates.description: A fearsome Mantellian Savrip brawler wielding natural claws and innate ferocity. Solid walls of muscle and primal power, devastating in close combat.
templates.quote: Feel the wrath of the claws!
templates.notes: Natural Weapons (claws) deal 1d6 slashing damage and poison targets on hit. Large size provides +5 damage threshold but -1 reflex penalty. Rage ability grants +2 melee bonus once per day. STR 22 (after +4 racial), CON 20 (after +4 racial). Natural Armor +2 to Reflex Defense. Speed 8 squares. Cannot take Heavy Weapons, Pistol, or Rifle proficiencies.

templates.name: Tank
templates.description: An armored defender designed to absorb massive amounts of damage and protect allies.
templates.quote: Behind me, soldier. I'll handle this.
templates.notes: HP 40, Reflex 21, Fort 19. Gen'Dai damage threshold is doubled! Crippled background means Damage Threshold ignores Condition Track penalties - perfect synergy for an unkillable tank.

templates.name: Commando
templates.description: A specialized commando operative trained for elite strike missions and team-based combat operations.
templates.quote: With my squad at my side, we can handle anything.
templates.notes: Elite commando with Sullustan darkvision and heightened awareness. Comrades in Arms grants +1 bonus to all melee and ranged attacks when within 3 squares of an ally. Sullust Origin adds Stealth as class skill for +3 bonus, perfect for elite strike missions.

templates.name: Worker
templates.description: A skilled laborer, mechanic, or technician. Workers are the backbone of galactic civilization, maintaining infrastructure and repairing equipment.
templates.quote: Honest work, honest pay. That's all I need.
templates.notes: Mechanics +10, HP ~7 (1d4+1). 3 starting feats: Skill Training (Mechanics), Skill Training (Use Computer), Skill Focus (Mechanics). Workers make excellent technicians and support personnel. Extra 820 credits in equipment for field work.

templates.name: Trooper
templates.description: A baseline soldier, guard, or militia member. Troopers have basic military training but lack the experience and skill of true heroes.
templates.quote: Following orders. That's what keeps the galaxy running.
templates.notes: Attack +1, Reflex 11, HP ~7 (1d4+1). 3 starting feats: Armor Proficiency (Light), Weapon Proficiency (Rifles), Weapon Proficiency (Pistols). Standard military trooper. Extra 755 credits in military equipment.

templates.name: Criminal
templates.description: A petty thug, gang member, or street criminal. Criminals live on the edge of society, relying on intimidation and violence.
templates.quote: Credits or your life. Your choice.
templates.notes: Attack +1, Deception +7, HP ~6 (1d4+0). 3 starting feats: Weapon Proficiency (Pistols), Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons), Skill Training (Deception). Street criminals and thugs. Extra 750 credits in illicit equipment.

templates.name: Merchant
templates.description: A trader, shopkeeper, or business professional. Merchants know the value of everything and have connections throughout the commercial sector.
templates.quote: Everything has a price, my friend. Let's negotiate.
templates.notes: Persuasion +10, Gather Information +7, HP ~6 (1d4+0). 3 starting feats: Skill Training (Persuasion), Skill Training (Gather Information), Skill Focus (Persuasion). Merchants excel at social interactions. Extra 765 credits in business equipment.

templates.name: Police Officer
templates.description: A law enforcement officer, security guard, or constable. Police maintain order and enforce laws in civilized systems.
templates.quote: By the authority of the law, stand down!
templates.notes: Perception +8, Reflex 11, HP ~7 (1d4+1). 3 starting feats: Armor Proficiency (Light), Weapon Proficiency (Pistols), Skill Training (Perception). Local law enforcement. Extra 775 credits in law enforcement equipment.
